title: Himi 357
lyrics:
7’s
1.
Ke ‘oua na’a tau fiu
‘I he fa’a kataki,
‘A e ngaahi mamahi,
‘I hotau mahaki ni.
2.
Ko e tokanga hake,
Ki he ‘Eiki ko Sīsū;
Ko e tokoni’anga,
Ki he tu’utāmaki.
3.
He ko e pule’anga,
‘Oku tau tokanga’i;
‘Oku lava’i ia,
‘E he fa’a kātaki.
4.
Pea ko hono hala,
Ki he fonua lelei,
Ko ‘etau fa’a mo’ua,
‘I he ngaahi mamahi.
5.
Ko hotau ‘ahi’ahi,
Ka ‘oku ‘ikai kovi,
He ko e me’a ako,
Pe ko hotau ‘auhani.
6.
Pea tau fa’a lava’i,
‘A hotau ngaahi fili,
Pea mā’oni’oni,
‘A hotau laumālie. *
